featured.text: It is believed that the martial art was connected with tribal fighting in Africa, in which people fought body to body, without weapons, in order to acquire a bride or desired woman.
Is synesthesia genetically inherited or acquired after birth?
Another possibility is simply that we may acquire languages differently as children than we do as adults.

definition.en_def: To gain possession of something or to obtain something.
definition.example: She hopes to acquire new skills through her internship.
